Framey: Simplify Your Web Development Workflow ‚ú®

Framey is a lightweight yet powerful browser extension designed to help you instantly highlight and outline elements on any webpage in your preferred color and styles.

What is Framey? üñåÔ∏è
Framey allows designers, developers, and QA testers to easily visualize and inspect web elements by applying customizable outlines. Choose from various styles and colors to match your specific needs.

How Does It Work? üîß
With a simple interface, Framey lets you pick a color and style, then instantly applies the outlines across the webpage. Toggle visibility with a single click to keep your workspace clean when you're done.

Why Use Framey? üöÄ
Framey saves time, reduces confusion, and improves workflow efficiency. Whether you're inspecting layout issues, testing responsiveness, or refining UI elements, this extension adds clarity and precision to your process.

Elevate your web development and design experience with Framey‚Äîbecause even small tools can have a big impact!
